name: Monkey Runner (marccanalsp)
description:
__________

The evil Xopnil has arrived to do his thing. Our protagonist will reach him as soon as possible to defeat him and restore the colors of the world. They will not make it easy for us, Xopnil will display all his minions and obstacles while he distorts the colors of the scene.

At the whim of Xopnil, we will see the world according to each type of color blindness and that will prevent us from seeing some elements while we do not stop running.

The main mechanics come from an arcade runner: Our protagonist will run nonstop through a scenario that will be procedurally generated. During the race, Xopnil will randomly change the perception of the colors.

__________

Controls: Space to jump, left-click to shoot.

__________

Game made by Bartomeu Fontcuberta, Eric Elies, Gerard Bystron and Marc Canals

__________
